title.narrative: Agriculture Productivity and Trade Development for Lesotho

description.narrative: The project will develop national capacity in production and marketing of high-value FFVs. This capacity building will enable smallholders farmers supply products that meet buyers’ requirements such as standards and quality in hotels, supermarkets and other retail outlets within and outside Lesotho. This project will be driven and led by the key ministries: MTICM and MAFS, with technical assistance by ITC. The project outcomes directly support MDGs 1, 3 and 5 and also enhance integration of Lesotho into the global trade.

provider-org.narrative: UNOPS helps the UN and its partners run peacebuilding, humanitarian and development operations for people in need.
UNOPS helps the UN and its partners run peacebuilding, humanitarian and development operations for people in need.
